get_office_info_detail: Tri Tue Bookstore is currently one of the largest bookstores in Hanoi that can meet a large number of buyers during the holidays or outstanding events at the end of the year. Especially with educational books and books related to education, bookstores have satisfied not only teachers and students but also demanding parents.
